name: Ember Dragon
temple_description:
Ember Dragon is the embodiment of anger and flame. 
Her origins are unknown, yet her power rivals that of the gods. 
She inhabits a volcanic crater that has remained active since ancient times. 
Due to its inaccessibility, few have witnessed her true form.

active_skills.name: Ember Dragon Breath
active_skills.effect: Inflicts [Ignite] on targets, causing them to lose 6% of their current HP per round for 4 rounds.

active_skills.name: Flames Bomb
active_skills.effect: If the target is in [Ignite] state, the damage is converted into True Damage, bypassing defense and resistance.

exclusive_ur+_skill.name: Nova Blast
exclusive_ur+_skill.effect: Upon entering battle, inflicts a [Nova Mark] on the enemy with the highest ATK for 3 turns. If the marked enemy's ATK is lower than Ember Dragon's ATK, reduces their ATK by 50% for 1 round. During her action, inflicts [Justice Fire] on all enemies, decreasing their Healing Effect by 50% for 1 round.

status_effects.Nova Mark: Enemies with this state will be attacked first.

status_effects.Justice Fire: Affected enemies lose 8% of their Max HP (not exceeding 10 times Ember Dragon's ATK). This effect bypasses Debuff RES.
